# repeats

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the display of an animated image repeats the animation sequence indefinitely.

## Declaration

```swift
var repeats: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The animation repeats when this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]; otherwise, animation occurs only once.

## Getting State Information

- **identifier**: The string that your app uses to identify the voice control state.
- **titleVariants**: The array of title variants for the voice control state.
- **image**: The image displayed while the voice control template is in this state.
